hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Fairy Bottle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Serenade of Water#.
